name: Nespresso
description: The Nespresso story began in 1986, with a pioneering concept of portioned premium coffee. Today we continue to innovate to bring companies the highest quality coffee experience. It means working hand-in-hand with a network of more than 111,000 farmers participating in the AAA Sustainable Quality Program. We look to meet the specific needs of your business, whatever your size or volume of coffee needed. This enables you to choose from a full range of robust machines and enjoy our different coffee families and flavours, each with a distinct origin and unique blend. To guarantee the same level of quality sip after sip, our dedicated after-sales service can provide you with a tailored and rapid response.
features: NESPRESSO BELIEVE COFFEE IS AN ART

ShortDescription: When your company’s reputation depends on consistently delivering excellence, the quality of your coffee should be no different. Nespresso professional services delivers excellent quality of services.
enhanced_description: Nespresso offers a premium, portioned coffee experience designed for businesses of all sizes, ensuring high-quality coffee and professional services. Originating in 1986, Nespresso focuses on bringing companies an exceptional coffee experience, supporting employee well-being and contributing to total rewards. The offering includes a full range of robust coffee machines and diverse coffee families, all sourced through the AAA Sustainable Quality Program involving over 111,000 farmers. Nespresso provides dedicated after-sales service for tailored and rapid support, guaranteeing consistent quality that contributes to a company's reputation for excellence.
